1:
--------------------
Text: Fearless (Eighth Wonder album):  It is the group's only UK album release, is entirely uptempo, and contains six UK-issued singles (the earliest, "Stay With Me", dating back to 1985) including their highest-selling and best-remembered track, the Pet Shop Boys-produced and written "I'm Not Scared" (a #7 hit), and "Cross My Heart" (#13).
Triplets:<Fearless
3:
--------------------
Text: Fearless (Eighth Wonder album):  Eighth Wonder split up in 1989, with lead singer Patsy Kensit going on to devote herself to her acting career.
Triplets:<Patsy Kensit
